page.title: 05OUTSTANDING BUILDINGS
page.content: There are three important buildings in the area These are{Craigrownie {Church,Cove Burgh Hall}and the{School. {Craigrownie Church Hall}was once {Lindowan Church}but when the churches joined it became the Hall.It has very large stain glass windows which are quite valuable.The church which is at the top of the hill is just outside our area. The{Burgh Hall}is next to the Church and was built last century by public subscription.The library is in this building and also the Community Council meet there.It is used by many organisations for dances jumble sales and other fund raising events.The local drama group present two plays a year. The School is a mixture of old and new.Two rooms in the Annexe were built during the Second World War to
